text.div:
eLTSS Observation Codes

Observation codes for Strength and Preference

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/eLTSS/CodeSystem/eltss-observation-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
strength StrengthA favorable attribute of oneself, his/her support network, environment and/or elements of his/her life.
preference PreferencePresents the person's personal thoughts about something he or she feels is relevant to his or her life experience and may be pertinent when planning.

name: ELTSS_Observation_Codes
title: eLTSS Observation Codes
description: Observation codes for Strength and Preference

concept.definition: A favorable attribute of oneself, his/her support network, environment and/or elements of his/her life.
Presents the person's personal thoughts about something he or she feels is relevant to his or her life experience and may be pertinent when planning.
